events.text:
That was... weird.
You definitely heard someone in there.
They said something about that world being in chaos.
And they also mentioned...
... Fairies, huh?
So you were right.
You were right about the connection between your dreams, bullet hells, and mythology.
It's...
You're... Happy!
You're relieved! You're relieved that what you were chasing after, this once, didn't disappear before your eyes.
And you will keep chasing after it.
Even if in your dreams, every fairy disappears when you get close, you will keep chasing them.
In the hopes that, one time, one of these days, they will take you with them.
It's all you can do now, hope. You can't do anything else.
Which is so, so
Infuriating.
The world around you is dying! Things get worse every day! Everything you think you know turns out to be wrong!
And right underneath everyone's noses, there has been this magical reality we've denied ourselves access!
And the only people who would agree with you are distrusted by everyone else.
Some with good reason! Some people you had to dig up in your research were charlatans, racists, or otherwise weird and bad.
But it all makes too much sense to not be true!
Youkai sightings in Japan have been in ridiculously low numbers since the second half of the 19th century. They are the case zero of fantastical sightings decreasing around the world.
And, again in Japan, the people who get interested in that stuff often just... disappear.
They come back only sometimes.
It all points towards... Something, in Japan, that's causing this. Whatever it is, it has to be magical. It has to be fantastical.
It has to show this disgraced world is not the only thing there is.
If there really is a better place out there, you want to be part of it. Even if it means leaving it all behind.
If you can't do that, you want to know whether it exists, for sure.
Because then, hopefully, it will at least stop haunting you.
